casebody.data:
COURT OF APPEALS. Decisions, April Term, 1848,

at the City Hall in the City of New York

Cornelia Dodge, appellant, vs. Ralph Manning and others, respondents. —Decree of the Chancellor modified. N. Hill, Jr., for appel lant ; M. T. Reynolds, for respondents.

This was a case involving the construction of a will in regard to the charge and lien of a legacy, and the time when, and by whom it should be paid. (Reported, 1 Comstock, 298.)
